label: cascading_failure_01_ep_021
content:
## 2024-02-04 Daily Operations Summary

- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 151900 | p50: 155ms p95: 410ms p99: 720ms | err: 0.62% (940 errors) | success: 99.38%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 149100 | p50: 290ms p95: 590ms p99: 740ms | err: 0.29% (430 errors) | success: 99.71%
- /auth: REQUESTS 198000 | p50: 45ms p95: 116ms p99: 215ms | err: 0.14% (270 errors) | success: 99.86%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 266700 | p50: 58ms p95: 172ms p99: 315ms | err: 0.13% (340 errors) | success: 99.87%
- /search: REQUESTS 231600 | p50: 77ms p95: 210ms p99: 370ms | err: 0.19% (430 errors) | success: 99.81%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 187900 | p50: 98ms p95: 275ms p99: 465ms | err: 0.22% (420 errors) | success: 99.78%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 72% | Mem 79% | Disk 63% | Conns: 5250 | Net: 690/830 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 69% | Mem 77% | Disk 62% | Conns: 5080 | Net: 670/810 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 78% | Mem 79% | Disk 60% | Conns: 4950 | Net: 630/742 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 46% | Mem 79% | Disk 86% | Conns: 372 | Net: 176/210 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 200 | idle 0 | waiting 220 | exhaustion: 15 | max: 200 | avg_wait: 185ms
- replica: active 100 | idle 0 | waiting 45 | exhaustion: 6 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 48ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 125 | exhaustion: 15 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 215ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92.0% | Bandwidth: 9.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 469200

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-02: error_pct=2.69
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=420 retry_rate_pct=0.34
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-02: pool=primary events=15 waiting=220

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Enabled feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' for 5% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Scaled gateway autoscaling min from 2 to 3
- Updated pager routing for CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE to include manager

### On-Call
- Shift: K. Okafor. 14 pages. 5 tickets (CO-830, SRV-B-266, POOL-588, GW-360, FF-91). Status: Mitigating.
